estate_title: Modern Single-Family Home with Stunning Views
description: This contemporary single-family home offers panoramic views of the city skyline. Featuring spacious living areas, a gourmet kitchen, and a landscaped backyard with a pool.
Elegant townhouse located in the heart of the historic district. This three-story home boasts high ceilings, hardwood floors, and a private courtyard. Walking distance to shops and restaurants.

estate_title: Modern Urban Apartment with City Views
description: Sleek apartment in a high-rise building offering breathtaking city views. Features include floor-to-ceiling windows, stainless steel appliances, and access to a rooftop terrace.
Convenient student housing located within walking distance to the university campus. Fully furnished apartments with modern amenities, study areas, and communal lounges.

estate_title: Senior Living Community with Resort Amenities
description: Retirement community offering resort-style living for active seniors. Amenities include a clubhouse, fitness center, walking trails, and scheduled activities.

estate_title: Beachfront Vacation Rental with Private Beach Access
description: Escape to this beachfront retreat with direct access to a private beach. This vacation rental features spacious accommodations, a fully equipped kitchen, and a patio with ocean views.

estate_title: Charming Family Home with Garden Oasis
description: Quaint single-family home nestled in a peaceful neighborhood. Enjoy the lush garden oasis with mature trees, a pond, and a pergola-covered patio.
Inviting townhouse located in a charming suburb. Features include a renovated kitchen, hardwood floors, and a fenced backyard perfect for pets.
Large apartment situated in a vibrant neighborhood with trendy cafes and boutiques. The unit boasts modern finishes, ample storage, and a balcony for outdoor relaxation.
